publicwhip.minor-heading: Clause 166 - Additional power to give grants for social housing

speech.p: With this it will be convenient to discuss the following amendments:

(f) any conditions necessary to ensure equivalence of standards between recipients of grant under this section and registered social landlords.'.
No. 279, in

speech.p: No. 280, in
